reviewText: Cute, lighthearted Italian movie. It is about a romantic relationship with a 37 year old man, and a 17 year old girl.  If that doesn't seem comfortable to you, best to skip it. It doesn't play on USA DVD players so you'll have watch on your computer or some other way.
Everything came out perfectly, thanks. The film is really good, doesn't take the easy way and has some memorable moments.
